articles.title: Message of Sympathy to President of DR Congo
articles.content:
Message of Sympathy to President of DR Congo
 Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Tuesday sent a message of sympathy to President of the Democratic Republic of Congo Joseph Kabila Kabange in connection with the fact that natural disaster caused by recent torrential rain in the northeastern area of the country claimed huge human and material losses.
					 The message expressed deep consolation and sympathy to the president, government and people of the country and the inhabitants in the afflicted area.
					
					 It hoped that the government and people of the Democratic Republic of Congo would eradicate the damage as early as possible and register successes in the work to achieve the stability and the socio-economic development of the country.

articles.title: Congratulations to Algerian PM
articles.content:
Congratulations to Algerian PM
 Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju Monday sent a congratulatory message to Ahmed Ouyahia on his appointment as prime minister of Algeria.
					 Expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries and peoples would grow stronger, the message wished the prime minister successes in his responsible work for the development and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: DPRK Premier Tours Samjiyon County
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Tours Samjiyon County
 Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju made a field survey of Samjiyon County where construction projects are underway.
					 He went round the Samjiyon Youth Railway Station, Paektusan Museum, wind and solar power plants and other objects under construction and encouraged the shock brigade members of the Division 216 in performing feats in construction.
					
					 At a field consultative meeting, practical measures were taken to produce finishing building materials by use of abundant pumice in the area of Samjiyon, ensure the construction speed and quality at the highest level and help related units fully supply equipment and materials to the construction sites.
					
					 The premier also visited the Hyesan Youth Mine and the Unhung Refinery to learn about their production. He called for maximizing the production of mineral resources and nonferrous metal and took steps to speed up the project for sprucing up Samjiyon County.

articles.title: U.S. Will be to Blame for Consequences from Joint Military Drill: KPA Panmunjom Mission
articles.content:
U.S. Will be to Blame for Consequences from Joint Military Drill: KPA Panmunjom Mission
 Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Panmunjom Mission of the Korean People's Army released a statement on Tuesday over the U.S. imperialists' start of Ulji Freedom Guardian 17 joint military drill to invade the DPRK in collusion with the south Korean puppet warmongers.
					 According to the statement, more than 17,500 U.S. imperialist aggressor troops in south Korea and abroad, at least 50,000 troops of the south Korean puppet army and armed forces of seven satellite countries are now participating in the war rehearsal together with 480,000 public employees of the puppet administration and police, paramilitary forces and personnel of private enterprises as well as lethal equipment of the aggressor forces in the U.S. mainland and Pacific operational theatre involved.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is the fact that though the enemies are noisily vociferating about "annual" and "defensive maneuver", the rehearsal is concentrated on the drill of "beheading operation" and "secret operation" to "remove" the supreme headquarters of the DPRK and one for countering the DPRK's ballistic rockets under "OPLAN 5015", an aggressive war scenario to carry out preemptive strike against the DPRK.
					
					 No one can vouch that these huge forces concentrated in south Korea will not go over to an actual war action now that the military tensions have reached an extreme pitch in the Korean peninsula.
					
					 Moreover, high-ranking bosses of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces flew into south Korea to hold a war confab. Such huddle is increasing the gravity of the situation, the statement notes, and goes on:
					
					 Dunford, chairman of the U.S. Joint Chiefs of Staff, flew into south Korea on August 13 to be followed by the commander of the U.S. forces in the Pacific and the commander of the U.S. Strategic Forces on August 20 and then the chief of the Missile Defence Agency.
					
					 It is by no means fortuitous that the public opinion at home and abroad have expressed deep concern over the trips to south Korea by brass hats of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces, who would be directly in charge of preemptive strike at the DPRK and war of aggression, with the present joint military exercises as an occasion.
					
					 The U.S. will be wholly held accountable for the catastrophic consequences to be entailed by such reckless aggressive war maneuvers, as it chose a military confrontation with the DPRK.

articles.title: Exhibition of Achievements Made in Work of Youth League Opens
articles.content:
Exhibition of Achievements Made in Work of Youth League Opens
 Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- An exhibition of achievements made in the work of the youth league was opened with due ceremony at the Central Youth Hall Tuesday to celebrate the 90th anniversary of the founding of the Young Communist League of Korea.
					 Displayed there in various forms are data and materials showing the achievements made by the youth league in the work to defend and glorify the idea on youth movement of the peerlessly great persons of Mt Paektu and their leadership feats and enhance the militant function and role of the youth league organizations so that the young people would fulfill their honorable mission and duty as youth vanguard in defending socialism and building an economic power.
					
					 Attending the ceremony were Choe Ryong Hae, officials concerned and youth league officials.

articles.title: World Breastfeeding Week 2017 Observed
articles.content:
World Breastfeeding Week 2017 Observed
 Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- There took place an event at the People's Palace of Culture on Tuesday to observe the world breastfeeding week 2017.
					 It was attended by officials of public health and press fields and relevant units, women in Pyongyang and the United Nations resident coordinator and UNDP resident representative, the representative of UNICEF and WHO and other officials of international bodies here and staff members of foreign embassies here.
					
					 Speakers at the event said breastfeeding is necessary for preventing diseases of children and promoting their growth.
					
					 They underlined the need to promote the social concern and understanding of the importance of breastfeeding and achieve the close cooperation and nexus among public organizations in order to improve the health of babies and their mothers.
					
					 Prizes were awarded to exemplary public health and hygienic information officials and mothers. Then followed a lecture on breastfeeding and child health.
					
					 The participants watched a Korean science film about child health and nutrition and enjoyed an art performance given by children of the Kaeson Kindergarten in Moranbong District.

articles.title: DPRK Players Prove Successful at 29th Summer Universiad
articles.content:
DPRK Players Prove Successful at 29th Summer Universiad
 Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- DPRK players are proving successful at the 29th Summer Universiad now under going in Taipei of China.
					 They bagged two gold medals, one silver medal and one bronze medal on Aug. 21, in the wake of winning three gold medals and two silver medals in the events of weightlifting and diving on the first day of the games.
					
					 Kim Kuk Hyang and Kim Yun Hyang placed first at the 10 meter synchro platform diving, outnumbering their Russian and Australian rivals.
					
					 Ri Su Yon took the first place in the women's weightlifting 53kg with lift of 90kg in the snatch and 118kg in the jerk, 208kg in total.
					
					 Kim Myong Hyok placed second in the men's weightlifting 69kg by lifting 331kg in total and Kim Chung Sim third in the women's weightlifting 58kg with lift of 217 kg in total.

articles.title: Achievements Made in Food and Consumer Goods Industries
articles.content:
Achievements Made in Food and Consumer Goods Industries
 Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- Factories under the Ministry of the Food and Consumer Goods Industries in the DPRK channel great efforts into developing new quality products under the banner of self-reliance and self-development.
					 More than one hundred kinds of foodstuffs and daily necessities have been developed this year.
					
					 The Pyongyang Wheat Flour Processing Factory, the Pyongyang Condiments Factory and the Kyongryon Aeguk Soda Pop Mill have developed ad produced scores of kinds of functional foodstuffs, including lysine bread, wheat-germ cake and tea, iodine soybean paste and dried fermented soybean.
					
					 Enriched gruel and calcium-supplementary soya milk powder produced by the Pyongyang Children's Foodstuff Factory are popular among the people.
					
					 The Sonhung Foodstuff Factory developed and produced 20-odd kinds of functional and natural foodstuffs in the first half of the year.
					
					 Workers and technicians of the Rangnang Disabled Soldiers' Essential Plastic Goods Factory newly produced various kinds of plastic goods needed for the improvement of the people's livelihood through mass technological innovation movement.
					
					 Meanwhile, the Pyongyang Cosmetics Factory developed functional cosmetics including mung-bean lotion, anti-ageing cream and sun cream.

articles.title: Natural Biological Activator
articles.content:
Natural Biological Activator
 Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- Researchers of the Botany Institute under the State Academy of Sciences were awarded inventor medals of the World Intellectual Property Organization as they developed a natural biological activator, an organic fertilizer based on vegetable materials.
					 The activator contains tannin, coumarin, saponin, essential oil, nitrogen, phosphorus, potassium, silicon, sulfur, magnesium, boron, zinc, vitamins, amino acid, etc. 
					
					 Not harmful to human being, animals and plants, it enhances the photosynthetic capacity of the plants and accelerates the root activation. It is effective against damage from anthracnose, root rot and downy mildew.
					
					 It is used as additional fertilizer at the time of drought, bad growth and late earing. It helps increase the output of grain and vegetables with less chemical fertilizers.
					
					 It is in great demand in the field of greening.

articles.title: U.S. Should Not Misjudge Retaliatory Will of DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Should Not Misjudge Retaliatory Will of DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- Despite the world-wide criticism of his bellicose remarks about "fire and fury", Trump has not yet come to his senses.
					 Recently, he spouted again a load of rubbish that he would tackle the issue through not a good method, asserting military has been loaded and is ready to fire.
					
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says:
					
					 Nightmare of a nuclear disaster is haunting the U.S. distressed with uneasiness and horror that mad guy Trump's unrestrained war-inciting tongue-lashing might turn the U.S. mainland into huge heaps of ashes.
					
					 Through its two successful ICBM test-launches the DPRK clearly showed that it is capable of turning the whole U.S. mainland into a sea of flames through a sudden strike.
					
					 But what the Trump cult is doing is unimaginably reckless.
					
					 It is inciting war hysteria, letting out a load of rubbish getting on the nerves of the army and people of the DPRK. It seems that it doesn't consider the safety of Americans.
					
					 Despite the repeated warnings of the DPRK, it kicked off Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military drills.
					
					 The situation is falling into a deeper quagmire. Only absolute force can contain the reckless military maneuvers of the Yankees.
					
					 To thoroughly neutralize and wipe out all troops and means to be involved in invasion through preemptive actions is the consistent operation mode of the revolutionary forces of the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. should cogitate reasonably and judge correctly if it is not to lose its face, hit hard again by the DPRK. This is another warning served by the latter.
					
					 The U.S. should not misjudge the toughest retaliatory will of Juche Korea.

articles.title: Minju Joson Urges U.S. to Behave Itself
articles.content:
Minju Joson Urges U.S. to Behave Itself
 Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- Much upset by the DPRK's two test-launches of ICBM Hwasong-14, the U.S. Trump administration is bluffing that it would do something big but this is nothing but a last-ditch effort of those facing an imminent ruin, says Minju Joson Tuesday in a commentary.
					 The U.S. is kicking up the hysteria of military confrontation, not understanding whom it is standing against. Its act is little short of putting a noose around its own neck, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The historical course of the DPRK-U.S. nuclear stand-off and the present situation clearly prove that independence precisely means justice and justice is bound to triumph.
					
					 The DPRK has not even a little doubt in its victory in the nuclear stand-off with the U.S. and it is the comment of the unbiased world public.
					
					 Should the U.S. dare to provoke the DPRK, defying the latter's strategic position that has reached a high level, it will lead it to a shameful result of plunging into the abyss of self-destruction.
					
					 The U.S. stands at the crossroads of war or peaceful co-existence.
					
					 In order to defuse tension in the area around the Korean peninsula and check dangerous military conflict, it is necessary for the U.S. to show in action its proper option as it has caused trouble after bringing huge nuclear strategic hardware into the areas around the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. has to opt for proper understanding and action if it does not want to suffer shame for its foolish act.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Warmongers' Moves to Overcome Military Inferiority
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Warmongers' Moves to Overcome Military Inferiority
 Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet warmongers, taken aback by the DPRK's successive successful test-launch of ICBM Hwasong-14, are busy turning the "military strategy toward the north" into an offensive one.
					 They designated the main purpose of "defense strategy" as the buildup of "triad strike system" including "Kill Chain" while talking about "overwhelming defense capability". But, now they assert that the "Kill Chain" is "operation conception for defense" and have decided to amend it as the "operation conception for attack" based on the "operation plan for large-scale counteraction" to strike the core facilities of the DPRK.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a commentary denounces this as the revelation of bellicose scheme to overcome the military inferiority and persistently fight with the DPRK.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Under the situation where their master U.S. is afraid of the DPRK's merciless military retaliation, the puppet military gentries no more than the U.S. bullet shields and poor war servants are crying out for the "operation conception for attack". This is a tragicomedy that makes the boiled head of a cow provoke a side-splitting laughter.
					
					 The "operation plan for large-scale counteraction" touted by the puppet forces, who are not knowing that their master U.S. is faced with a final doom, will draw the curtain as the "operation for mass self-destruction".
					
					 The puppet warmongers would be well advised to stop the foolish act of inviting the barrage of fire from the DPRK and behave prudently under the tense situation.

articles.title: UNSC Is Bargaining Ground of Interest-seeking Powers: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
UNSC Is Bargaining Ground of Interest-seeking Powers: KCNA Commentary
 Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- The situation on the Korean peninsula has rapidly aggravated after the adoption of the anti-DPRK "sanctions resolution" 2371 at the UN Security Council under the manipulation of the U.S.
					 The DPRK government flatly denied the "resolution", aimed to completely block its economic development and improvement of people's livelihood, as a wanton violation of the sovereignty of the country and clarified its will to make the toughest counteraction against it.
					
					 Meanwhile the U.S. started large-scale joint military exercises, flexing its military muscle, thus driving the situation to a catastrophic phase.
					
					 After all, the UN Security Council has discarded its basic mission and this has made it unable to evade the responsibility for putting the peace and security in the Korean peninsula, the region and the rest of the world in peril.
					
					 Those countries which voted for the sanctions against the DPRK are now going busy, calling for "restraint" and "peaceful solution". This is a clear indication of the embarrassment they have faced over the development of the situation.
					
					 It is truth repeatedly proven in history that sanctions would never help solve the problem and they are not beneficial to anyone.
					
					 However, the UNSC cooked up the illegal and unprecedented inhuman "sanctions resolution" against the DPRK again. This clearly proves its nature as a means for executing the White House's policy hostile toward the DPRK and its position as a political waiting maid serving the U.S.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is the fact that the UNSC has turned into a behind-the-scene bargaining ground of big powers for meeting their interests.
					
					 Before voting for the "resolution", its permanent members had shown off principle and faith, saying that sanctions themselves are not the purpose and they should not impinge on the usual economic activities and people's living in the DPRK. But they made a U-turn overnight. This is not a secret.
					
					 Do the permanent member nations have the face to trumpet about independent right, guarantee of security and international justice, and can they be called responsible big countries in the true sense of the words as they went impudent as to place their own interests above the existence and security of a sovereign state.
					
					 After yielding to the U.S. high-handed and arbitrary practices and to meet their imminent interests, the big powers trampled the sovereignty and rights to existence and development of a sovereign country. This could have "impressed" the U.S. but the response to it by the international community is unusually negative.
					
					 The Turkish newspaper Daily Sabah on August 10, noting  that "countries taking issue with the nuclear weapons of north Korea are nuclear powers", commented "nuclear powers are closely watched as they invade and bomb other countries, get themselves ready to destroy the third world countries and brand those countries as 'dangerous elements' while pushing them into a tight corner".
					
					 This report represents the perspective of the international community on the arrogant powers.
					
					 Such outdated international order as the UNSC system can no longer guarantee the future of humankind.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Snipes at S. Korean Defense Minister's Reckless Behavior
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Snipes at S. Korean Defense Minister's Reckless Behavior
 Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- Defense Minister Song Yong Mu of south Korea is going reckless, faulting the DPRK's toughest offensive against the U.S.
					 At a video meeting of all major commanding officers he cried out for "immediate and resolute punishment", talking about the north's possible "strategic provocation" and "tactical provocation of making a sound in the east and launching a strike in the west." Touring the units in the area of five islands of the West Sea, he ordered soldiers to fight with a death-defying will.
					
					 At the "National Assembly" he called for "demonstrating the retaliatory will of the south Korea-U.S. alliance", citing a joint fire demonstration with the U.S. forces, intensive drill for countering the north's nuclear missile and deployment of U.S. strategic assets on the Korean peninsula as its detailed methods for doing so.
					
					 The public feel bored with the oft-repeating talk about "north's provocation" and "immediate punishment" in south Korea.
					
					 But they were surprised with the bellicose remarks spouted by him without any elementary sense of the reality and responsibility as he is only a one-month-old "puppy-like" minister.
					
					 Now a touch-and-go situation is prevailing on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The world public attention has been focused on the peninsula where a war may break out any moment due to the U.S. and its vassal forces' fabrication of the outrageous UN "sanctions resolution" and provocative moves for igniting a war against the DPRK.
					
					 Song's invective against this backdrop is just an act of precipitating the self-destruction.
					
					 It seems that he is running wild, relying on the master of the White House who frequently posts weird articles of his ego-driven thoughts in his twitter and spouts rubbish to make his assistants have a hard time.
					
					 The puppets of south Korea, accustomed to believing in and relying on the U.S., have lost their own way of thinking and sense of the reality.
					
					 The U.S. has no spell to care the "alliance with south Korea" as it is making desperate efforts to seek a way out, having a hard time in fear of the invincible might of the revolutionary forces of the DPRK.
					
					 For the U.S., its "alliance" with south Korea is the one for use in favorable time only.
					
					 Trump spouted rubbish that if a war breaks out, it would be on the Korean peninsula, and if thousands of people die, they would be only Koreans and Americans may sleep a sound sleep.
					
					 Pining hope on that mad guy, Song is urging the soldiers of the puppet army to "fight with confidence without any concern as the overwhelming south Korea-U.S. allied forces are fully ready for action."
					
					 How poor his plight is.
					
					 The DPRK doesn't reckon with Song, a running dog of the U.S.
					
					 He should bear in mind, though belatedly, that his ill tongue-lashing may lead to the total destruction of south Korea.
					
					 He had better behave prudently if he wants to survive.

articles.title: Eggs Containing Ingredient of Pesticide Produced in S. Korea
articles.content:
Eggs Containing Ingredient of Pesticide Produced in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- Ingredients of pesticide were reportedly detected in eggs produced at a chicken farm in Namyangju City, Kyonggi Province of south Korea, on August 14 to be followed by the similar incident at 31 other farms.
					 Eggs containing agricultural chemicals, harmful to human body, more than 20 times the tolerance limit have been produced and distributed in south Korea amid the non-stop occurrence of damage by all kinds of infectious diseases, adding to the uneasiness of south Koreans.

articles.title: Probe into Truth behind Disbandment of UPP Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Probe into Truth behind Disbandment of UPP Urged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- Former lawmakers from the Unified Progressive Party (UPP) and its members in south Korea held a press conference outside Chongwadae on August 16, urging the authorities to probe the truth behind the forced dissolution of the Party, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					 They disclosed that the Park Geun Hye "government" disbanded the UPP after cooking up the attempted rebellion case to calm down the public indignation at the Intelligence Service's involvement in the "presidential election".
					
					 The "constitutional court" has to reveal the fact by which the freedom of founding a political party was violated and the UPP was disbanded, now that the attempted rebellion case has been cleared of the charge, they said, demanding the present "government" make an official apology and punish those responsible.

articles.title: Explosion Causes Death in S. Korea
articles.content:
Explosion Causes Death in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- An explosion accident at a timber processing factory in Ansan City, Kyonggi Province on August 18 claimed a death, according to KBS of south Korea.
					 This is a typical example of the pitiful situation of the south Korean workers exposed to the constant danger at insecure worksites.

articles.title: Symposium on THAAD Impact on Public Environment in S. Korea Foiled
articles.content:
Symposium on THAAD Impact on Public Environment in S. Korea Foiled
 Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- Organizations against THAAD and citizens of south Korea reportedly foiled a symposium on impact of THAAD on public environment which the Defense Ministry was going to hold in Songju County, North Kyongsang Province on August 17.
					 They held a press conference outside Chojon-myon office and denounced the unilateral symposium planned by the Defense Ministry.
					
					 The speakers called for holding a symposium involving citizens after halting the THAAD operation, site construction and additional deployment.
					
					 After the press conference they sealed off the entrance of the office and strongly protested against the symposium as an official concerned of the Defense Ministry appeared at the entrance to the office for the symposium.

articles.title: S. Koreans Demand Stop to War Drills
articles.content:
S. Koreans Demand Stop to War Drills
 Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- Organizations of various circles in south Korea reportedly launched actions in Seoul on Monday, demanding stop to Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military drills.
					 The People's Action for Peace against War, composed of various civic and social bodies, and the Headquarters for People's All-out Action held a press conference and peace actions in front of Kwanghwamun.
					
					 Noting that the danger of military conflict on the Korean peninsula may lead to an actual war, they urged the chief executive to immediately stop the large-scale war drills if he doesn't want the outbreak of war.
					
					 They expressed their will to carry on their no-war actions until the end of the drills across south Korea and held demo in front of the U.S. embassy, in particular.
					
					 The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification and other organizations held a press conference outside Chongwadae after staging a no-war signature campaign.
					
					 They said that UFG should be stopped in order to defuse the war danger prevailing on the Korean peninsula. 
					
					 At the end of the press conference the organizations thrust the list of signatures to Chongwadae.
					
					 Meanwhile, many other organizations including the Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society and the Civic Peace Forum launched actions in demand of stop to the war drills at the Seoul Plaza.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Introduced in Bulgaria
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Introduced in Bulgaria
 Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- The Bulgarian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted on its website the full text of President Kim Il Sung's work "The DPRK Represents Genuine People's Power and Is a Banner of the Unity and Solidarity of the Masses" on Aug. 7 ahead of the Day of Songun.
					 The work, published on September 9, Juche 72 (1983), deals with the founding of the DPRK and its significance, the tasks for increasing its might and achieving prosperity, the three principles of national reunification and the ways for carrying them out, the independent and peace-loving foreign policy of the DPRK government and the tasks for realizing global independence.

articles.title: UNSC's "Sanctions Resolution" against DPRK Slammed Abroad
articles.content:
UNSC's "Sanctions Resolution" against DPRK Slammed Abroad
 Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- Indian and Nigerian bodies on Aug. 8 made public statements denouncing the UNSC "sanctions resolution" against the DPRK.
					 The All India Indo-Korean Friendship Association said in its statement that the "sanctions resolution" 2371 cooked up at the UNSC is a flagrant violation of the DPRK's sovereignty from A to Z as it is a product of the U.S. heinous moves to stifle the DPRK. It further said:
					
					 The UN should stop inflicting pain on other countries at the prodding of the U.S.
					
					 The world progressives must flatly reject the above-said "sanctions resolution".
					
					 Sovereign states should no longer have their rights infringed upon by big powers.
					
					 It is our duty to support the just cause of the Korean people reliably protecting peace and security on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 We appeal to the world progressive people to struggle against the anti-DPRK "sanctions resolution" of the UNSC.
					
					 The Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association strongly demanded the withdrawal of the illegal "resolution", terming it a frontal challenge and grave politically-motivated provocation to the DPRK, and the height of double standards.

articles.title: Anniversary of Korea's Liberation Marked Abroad
articles.content:
Anniversary of Korea's Liberation Marked Abroad
 Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- Lecture meetings took place in Hungary, Austria and Guinea between July 31 and August 11 to mark the 72nd anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 The chairman of the Hungarian Workers' Party praised the feats President Kim Il Sung performed to put an end to the military occupation of the Japanese imperialists and realize the historic cause of national liberation, saying that the Korean people could lead an independent and dignified life as the masters of their destiny and the imposing masters of the country and society after the liberation of Korea.
					
					 He said that under the Songun guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un the DPRK is demonstrating its might as an invincible military power any formidable enemy dares not provoke.
					
					 The chief and members of the Youth Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in Vienna stressed that Kim Il Sung is a peerless patriot as he waged an arduous great anti-Japanese war to achieve the freedom and independence of the DPRK.
					
					 They expressed their will to intensify the work to deeply study the Juche idea and introduce the DPRK.
					
					 Officials of the Defense Ministry and personages of the Guyco Company of Guinea said that the DPRK has emerged a world military power possessed of H-bomb and ICBM under the wise guidance of Kim Jong Un and that the Korean people would surely build a prosperous socialist power.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju recorre el distrito de Samjiyon
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju recorre el distrito de Samjiyon
Samjiyon, 22 de agosto (ACNC) -- El premier coreano Pak Pong Ju averiguo en el terreno como marcha el remozamiento del distrito de Samjiyon.
					El recorrio la Estacion Ferroviaria Juventud de Samjiyon, el Museo Universal del Monte Paektu, el lugar de construccion de la central eolica y solar y otras partes estimulando a los brigadistas de la Division 216 que impulsan a buen ritmo las obras encargadas.
					
					En la reunion consultiva convocada en el terreno, se tomaron las medidas de trabajo para producir los materiales de acabado de la construccion usando la pomez abundante en la zona de Samjiyon, asegurar en el maximo nivel la velocidad y calidad de la construccion y hacer a las unidades vinculadas suministrar con preferencia los equipos y materiales necesarios a la obra de remodelacion.
					
					Por otra parte, el premier paso revista a la Mina Juventud de Hyesan y la Fundicion de Metales no Ferrosos de Unhung donde indico los remedios para aumentar al maximo la produccion de minerales y metales no ferrosos y dar buen impulso al remozamiento de Samjiyon.

articles.title: Publicada declaracion del vocero de Representacion del EPC en Phanmunjom
articles.content:
Publicada declaracion del vocero de Representacion del EPC en Phanmunjom
Pyongyang, 22 de agosto (ACNC) -- Los imperialistas yanquis iniciaron junto con los belicistas surcoreanos el ejercicio militar conjunto "Ulji Freedom Guadian 17" para agredir la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Al respecto, el portavoz de la Representacion del Ejercito Popular de Corea en Phanmunjom publico el dia 22 una declaracion que prosigue:
					
					Ahora, se crea el ambiente de guerra en la Peninsula Coreana donde fueron movilizados mas de 17 mil y quinientos efectivos de las tropas norteamericanas ocupantes en el Sur de Corea y en ultramar, mas de 50 mil efectivos de ejercito titere surcoreano, las fuerzas armadas de 7 paises satelites, mas de 480 mil surcoreanos incluyendo los funcionarios de la administracion y los personajes de la policia, las fuerzas armadas civiles y las empresas civiles, asi como los equipos guerreros de las tropas norteamericanas desplegadas en el territorio principal de EE.UU. y la zona operacional del Oceano Pacifico.
					
					Lo que no podemos pasar por alto es que los enemigos hablan del caracter "anual" y "defensivo", por una parte y por la otra, realizan este simulacro dando enfasis en los ejercicios de "operacion de descabezamiento" y "operacion secreta" para "eliminar" la Direccion Suprema de la RPDC segun el "OPLAN 5015", guion de guerra de agresion para perpetrar el ataque preventivo a la RPDC, y en el ejercicio para hacer frente a nuestro cohete balistico.
					
					En la actual situacion tensa de esta peninsula no hay ninguna garantia de que esas fuerzas armadas concentradas en el Sur de Corea no pasaran a la guerra real.
					
					En particular, se duplica mas la gravedad del estado por el hecho de que los cabecillas militares de alto nivel de las tropas norteamericanas desarrollan las conspiraciones de guerra en el Sur de Corea. 
					
					Llegaron al Sur de Corea el dia 13 Joseph Dunford, presidente de la Junta de Jefes de Estado Mayor de EE.UU., el dia 20, el comandante de las fuerzas norteamericanas en el Pacifico y el comandante de las fuerzas estrategicas norteamericanas y luego, el director de la Agencia de Defensa de Misil, para realizar la conspiracion de guerra.
					
					No es casual que las prensas internas y externas expresan la gran preocupacion del viaje sucesivo en visperas del presente simulacro por los cabecillas de las tropas americanas quienes se encargan directamente del ataque preventivo y la guerra agresiva contra la RPDC.
					
					La responsabilidad de las consecuencias destructivas de estos alborotos militares la asumira enteramente EE.UU. que opto la confrontacion militar con la RPDC.

articles.title: EE.UU. debe ver bien la voluntad intransigente de la RPDC
articles.content:
EE.UU. debe ver bien la voluntad intransigente de la RPDC
Pyongyang, 22 de agosto (ACNC) -- A pesar de las criticas internacionales sobre su disparate de "llamas y furia", Trump dijo hace poco otras tonterias tales como solucionar el problema con el metodo desagradable y la bala esta cargada y dispuesta al disparo.
					Adelanta asi el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual fechado hoy y prosigue:
					
					Actualmente, EE.UU. sufre la pesadilla nuclear por la inquietud y temor a que las retoricas insensatas de Trump puedan causar la guerra nuclear que reducira a cenizas el territorio estadounidense.
					
					Al lograr el pleno exito en los dos lanzamientos de prueba de ICBM, la RPDC ha demostrado claramente su capacidad de envolver en llamas toda la extension geografica norteamericana mediante el disparo sorpresivo desde cualesquier region y lugar.
					
					Sin embargo, los compinches de Trump estan portandose de manera inimaginable.
					
					Sin tener en consideracion la seguridad de sus habitantes, muestran su histerico belicismo diciendo palabras irritantes a los militares y habitantes coreanos.
					
					Al fin y al cabo, iniciaron el entrenamiento militar conjunto Ulji Freedom Guardian sin hacer caso de las reiteradas advertencias de la RPDC.
					
					La situacion se pone cada vez mas fea. La unica manera para repararla esta en controlar con las fuerzas absolutas la aventura militar de EE.UU.
					
					Eliminar de antemano todos los efectivos y medios disponibles para la ofensiva agresiva anti-RPDC es el invariable modo de la operacion de reaccion de nuestras fuerzas armadas revolucionarias.
					
					EE.UU. debe pensar con sano juicio si no quiere sufrir la verguenza de ser golpeado otra vez por la RPDC.
					
					Le resulta imperioso juzgar bien la voluntad superintransigente de la Corea del Juche.

articles.title: ACNC comenta la conducta del Consejo de Seguridad a favor de las potencias
articles.content:
ACNC comenta la conducta del Consejo de Seguridad a favor de las potencias
Pyongyang, 22 de agosto (ACNC) -- Se ha empeorado bruscamente la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana despues de que se aprobara la "resolucion de sancion" No.2371 anti-RPDC en el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU a instigacion de EE.UU.
					La RPDC expreso la voluntad de reaccion superintransigente rechazando esa "resolucion" como violacion flagrante de su soberania mientras EE.UU. lleva la situacion a la fase mas critica realizando con fanfarronada el entrenamiento militar conjunto de gran tamano.
					
					Asi que el Consejo de Seguridad no puede eludir la responsabilidad de poner en peligro la paz y seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana, la region y el resto del mundo faltando a su mision principal.
					
					Perplejos por la situacion actual, los paises, que votaron a favor de la sancion anti-RPDC, andan ahora con ajetreo hablando de "control" y "solucion pacifica".
					
					Es un principio verificado repetidamente por la historia que la sancion no puede resolver el problema y resulta inutil para todos.
					
					Sin embargo, el Consejo de Seguridad volvio a fabricar la inaudita "resolucion de sancion" de caracter ilegal e inhumano. Este hecho deja en claro la naturaleza de ese aparato convertido en una herramienta y sirvienta politica en funcion de la politica hostil anti-RPDC de la Casa Blanca.
					
					Lo intolerable del caso es que el Consejo de Seguridad llego a ser el espacio de regateo detras de la cortina donde las potencias sacan provechos.
					
					No es secreto como cambiaron su posicion los miembros permanentes del Consejo de Seguridad que antes de la votacion, fingian tener la posicion intransigente diciendo que la sancion en si no es el objetivo y ella no debe afectar las normales actividades economicas y comerciales y la vida poblacional de la RPDC.
					
					Si se toma en cuenta ese acto cinico de poner sus intereses por encima de la existencia y seguridad de un Estado soberano, ?como se puede discutir el derecho independiente y la preservacion de seguridad de los paises miembros y la justicia internacional y llamar a esos paises como potencias responsables?
					
					Tal vez haya "conmovido" a EE.UU. la conducta de esas potencias que para sus intereses inmediatos y rendidos a la demanda despotica del imperio, violaron la soberania, el derecho a sobrevivir y el de desarrollo de un pais. Pero es tan negativa la reaccion de la sociedad internacional que ha provocado tal proceder.
					
					En un comentario intitulado "El mundo afronta la guerra nuclear" publicado el dia 10, el periodico turco Daily Sabah llamo la atencion al hecho de que "son potencias nucleares los paises que cuestionan el arma nuclear norcoreana".
					
					Especifico que "estan de nuevo bajo la lupa las potencias nucleares que se preparan para agredir y bombardear a otros paises y destruir a los del tercer mundo arrinconandolos bajo el pretexto de que son 'elementos peligrosos'". 
					
					Este comentario es un reflejo de la vision de la sociedad internacional sobre las potencias arrogantes.
					
					La anticuada estructura del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU o el viejo orden internacional no puede responsabilizarse mas por el futuro de la humanidad.
